config.enabled.name: Enable Mod
config.enabled.tooltip: Turn the mod on or off.
config.hud-messages.name: Show HUD Messages
config.hud-messages.tooltip: Show a message (e.g. '+5 Wood') when items are moved.
config.range.name: Trigger Range
config.range.tooltip: How close you must be to a chest (in tiles) for it to pull items.
config.sound-cooldown.name: Sound Cooldown
config.sound-cooldown.tooltip: How many ticks to wait between sound effects (60 ticks = 1 second).
config.menu-cooldown.name: Menu Exit Cooldown
config.menu-cooldown.tooltip: Seconds to disable auto-deposit after closing a chest (prevents items from being sucked back in immediately).
